idea-plugin.name: ADB Wireless Manager - Simple
idea-plugin.description:
ADB Wireless Manager - Simple Version

A clean, minimal plugin for managing wireless ADB connections.

Features:

  • Add and manage wireless devices
  • Connect/disconnect from devices
  • View connection status and logs
  • Simple, intuitive interface

How to use:

  1. Open the ADB Wireless tool window
  2. Add your device with IP address
  3. Click Connect to establish wireless connection
  4. Start debugging wirelessly!

Note: You need to pair your device first using regular ADB commands or Android Studio.

action.description: Open the ADB Wireless Manager tool window
